item.description: We are happy pug and companion dog lovers who enjoy getting together for play dates, fun holiday events and fun pug and all dog talks. Everyone is welcome, children too. Come visit and see how much fun we have. We used to be just a pug group... but realized many of us own other dogs besides our pugs. Â Our meetup location has an indoor and outdoor facility which allows us to have our meetups all year long.
item.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group
